metadata.title: CVE-2016-10210 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: libyara/lexer.l in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted rule that is mishandled in the yy_get_next_buffer function.

criterions.comment: yara package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.0+dfsg-9').
